tag_list: social-media, san-francisco, marketing, web-2-0, bbq, cook-off
overview:
Looking for job opportunities in the Bay Area, and happy to sit down and meet with anyone for advice!

Recent Marketing Major of Suffolk University carrying a BS in Business Administration with a concentration in Marketing and Social Media. Hard working, very organized and fast paced individual. Superior networking skills and strategies through attending international student fairs. Direct interest in various technologies and web based companies, as well as small startups where work elements change frequently. Enjoys the fast paced growth found at many companies, and would take the opportunity if given to find a firm with a similar work ethic. Possesses self-discipline to thoroughly finish tasks that have been started. Producer of quality ideas that are outside of the box but relate to the strategy focused on, and also capable of integrating those ideas into the common workplace.
